com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcDeviceFinder.DeviceListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SmcDeviceFinder

    public static interface SmcDeviceFinder.DeviceListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for when devices join or leave the network.

    Note

    Do not use Thread.sleep() method waiting for device added/removed event because sleep() blocks the thread and the event may never be received.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeviceAdded(SmcDeviceFinder deviceFinder, SmcDevice smcDevice)
      Called when a new device appears in the network.
      void onDeviceRemoved(SmcDeviceFinder deviceFinder, SmcDevice smcDevice, int error)
      Called when an existing device disappears from the network.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceAdded

        void onDeviceAdded(SmcDeviceFinder deviceFinder,
                 SmcDevice smcDevice)
        Called when a new device appears in the network.

        Note

        Do not use Thread.sleep() method waiting for device added/removed event because sleep() blocks the thread and the event may never be received.

        Parameters:
        deviceFinder - The SmcDeviceFinder instance that can access the device.
        smcDevice - The device that joined the network.

      • onDeviceRemoved

        void onDeviceRemoved(SmcDeviceFinder deviceFinder,
                   SmcDevice smcDevice,
                   int error)
        Called when an existing device disappears from the network.

        Note

        Do not use Thread.sleep() method waiting for device added/removed event because sleep() blocks the thread and the event may never be received.

        Parameters:
        deviceFinder - The SmcDeviceFinder instance that can no longer access the device.
        smcDevice - The device that has left the network.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
